trans-unit.source: Provides information about the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> elements within a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornece informações sobre o <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref> elementos dentro de um <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: PageContent elements are the only allowable child elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Elementos de PageContent são os elementos filho permitido somente de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>

trans-unit.source: The order of the PageContent elements within the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> defines the page order.
trans-unit.target: A ordem dos elementos de PageContent o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>define a ordem da página.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>

trans-unit.source: PageContent provides information about the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> elements within a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> without the requiring the application to load individual pages.
trans-unit.target: PageContent fornece informações sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>elementos dentro de um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>sem a necessidade do aplicativo ao carregar as páginas individuais.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A> dependency property specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A>Especifica uma propriedade de dependência de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] de correspondente <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the PageContent element, see Chapter 3 of the XPS *Open XML Paper Specification* available for download at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o elemento PageContent, consulte o capítulo 3 do XPS *Open XML Paper Specification* disponível para download em [XPS: especificação e Downloads de licença](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PageContent"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PageContent"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PageContent"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref> associado a esta <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PageContent"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Child property returns a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> when: 1.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade filho para retornar um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>quando: 1.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent> has an immediate <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> child defined in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] markup.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>tem imediato <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>filho definido em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] marcação.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage></xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.System%23Windows%23Markup%23IAddChild%23AddChild%2A> has been called to set the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> as the child of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.System%23Windows%23Markup%23IAddChild%23AddChild%2A>Foi chamado para definir o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>como o filho de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.System%23Windows%23Markup%23IAddChild%23AddChild%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Child property returns **null** when: 1.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade retorna filho **nulo** quando: 1.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> is set by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A> property (when specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> is not cached).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>é definido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A>propriedade (quando especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A>propriedade, o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>não é armazenado em cache).</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRoot%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A> to return the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> when set by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRoot%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A>para retornar o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>Quando definido o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent> element, see Chapter 3 of the XPS *XML Paper Specification* available for download at [http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpsspec.mspx](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpsspec.mspx).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>elemento, consulte o capítulo 3 do XPS *XML Paper Specification* disponível para download em [http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpsspec.mspx](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpsspec.mspx).</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage You cannot use this property in XAML.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML texto uso você não pode usar essa propriedade em XAML.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PageContent"></xref>, or **null** when the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> is set by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source*> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref> associado a esta <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PageContent"> </xref>, ou **nulo** quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref> é definido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.Source*>

trans-unit.source: Loads and returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> content element.
trans-unit.target: Carrega e retorna o <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref> elemento de conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: GetPageRoot performs synchronous loading and parsing of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
trans-unit.target: GetPageRoot executa síncrona Carregando e analisando o de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Use the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A>instead of GetPageRoot to avoid thread blocking while the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> loads.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Use o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A>GetPageRoot para evitar o thread em vez de bloqueio durante a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>carrega.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to always reload the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> even if it has been previously loaded and cached; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to load the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> only if there is no cached version.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>sempre recarregue o <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref> mesmo se ele foi previamente carregado e armazenados em cache; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para carregar o <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref> somente se não houver nenhuma versão armazenada em cache.

trans-unit.source: The root element of the visual tree for this page.
trans-unit.target: O elemento raiz da árvore visual da página.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously loads and returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> content element.
trans-unit.target: Carrega e retorna de forma assíncrona o <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref> elemento de conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: GetPageRootAsync asynchronously loads and parses the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> data stream associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>.
trans-unit.target: GetPageRootAsync assincronamente carrega e analisa o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>fluxo de dados associados a esta <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: Other threads will continue to run while GetPageRootAsync completes.
trans-unit.target: Outros threads continue em execução enquanto GetPageRootAsync é concluído.

trans-unit.source: The following steps illustrate how to load the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> content asynchronously: 1.
trans-unit.target: As etapas a seguir ilustram como carregar o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>conteúdo de forma assíncrona: 1.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: Create a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventHandler> delegate and add it to be notified of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted> events.
trans-unit.target: Criar um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventHandler>delegar e adicioná-lo para ser notificado sobre <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Call GetPageRootAsync.
trans-unit.target: Chame GetPageRootAsync.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted> event occurs and the delegate is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> content has completed loading.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted>eventos ocorre e o representante é chamado, o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>conteúdo for carregado.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The loaded <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> element is returned through the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O carregador <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>elemento será retornado por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `<PageContent>` element, see chapter 3 of the XPS specification which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o `<PageContent>` elemento, consulte o capítulo 3 da especificação de XPS, que pode ser obtido em [XPS: especificação e Downloads de licença](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to always reload the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> even if it has been previously loaded and cached; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to load the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> only if there is no cached version.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>sempre recarregue o <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref> mesmo se ele foi previamente carregado e armazenados em cache; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para carregar o <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref> somente se não houver nenhuma versão armazenada em cache.

trans-unit.source: Cancels any current <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync*> operation in progress.
trans-unit.target: Cancela qualquer atual <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync*>operação em andamento.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync*>

trans-unit.source: GetPageRootAsyncCancel cancels any <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A> operation that has not already finished with a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: GetPageRootAsyncCancel cancela qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A>operação que ainda não tiver terminado com um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootCompleted> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync*> has completed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync*>foi concluída.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.GetPageRootAsync*>

trans-unit.source: The GetPageRootCompleted event is handled by methods based on the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: O evento GetPageRootCompleted é tratado por métodos de acordo com o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventHandler>delegar.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageRootCompletedEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.LinkTarget"></xref> elements that identify the hyperlink-addressable locations on the page.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.LinkTarget"> </xref> elementos que identificam os locais endereçáveis de hiperlink na página.

trans-unit.source: LinkTargets will never return `null`, but the collection may contain zero elements.
trans-unit.target: Nunca retornarão LinkTargets `null`, mas a coleção pode conter zero elementos.

trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.target: O provedor de serviços de serialização.

trans-unit.target: Se manager não é e não tem um XmlWriter; caso contrário, .
